views.markdown:
- remove magic file check for iOS 11 (fixes crash when "file" package is installed) - fixed bug where "Import" button wasn't enabled

- add compatibility for iOS 11 - no more 'App May Slow Down Your iPhone' Warning Fixed problem with where importing wasn't working with JODebox v3 - add ability to import video from other apps or via Airdrop
- fix crash on startup in iOS 9
- fix some issues with importing in iOS 9
- fixes for iOS 8 (using JODebox/JOCastle instead of Gremlin) - fixes for problems with iPad - show error message about Gremlin on iOS 8 - App is now free for all - video files without extensions will also be included in searches

update requires the file package from Saurik's repo Telesphoreo, which "guesses the type of a file from contents." details for file)\ - loading an app to list the video files it contains has been improved and is now much faster, especially for apps with many files
- per app information about the amount of video files each contains
- the ability to send multiple files via email
- improved HUD displayed when searching, queuing and importing
- search and imports can continue in the background longer than the 2-10 minutes in previous versions
- iOS 7 style tab icons from Glyphish (also in files view now indicating folder or audio/visual file)
- small icons used for the apps view
- updated app icons
Support for iOS 7 (import using Gremlin)
Backwards compatibility for previous iOS versions
other various improvements
